name: Cursader
description:
Cursader is a short arcade game about a foolish knight searching for the Holy Grail. His quest leads him deep into a creepy catacomb, where he finds a sparkling cup. He rejoices, believing his quest has come to an end. But something seems a bit off...

If you want to escape the catacomb, you'll need to watch for falling skulls and collapsing floors. Try to collect precious gems along the way - if you're quick, you can build up your multiplier. Pass checkpoints to avoid being crushed by the ceiling.

Somewhere at the end of the tunnel, there is a light.

Cursader is being developed for iOS, which explains the vertical screen ratio. I'm planning to implement leaderboards and achievements in the mobile release. I hope you enjoy this "in development" version!
